name: Fitify - Fitness Tracker
shortDescription: A full-featured fitness tracker web app supporting Member, Trainer, and Admin dashboards with booking, payments, and progress tracking.
challenges: Implementing role-based authentication for multiple dashboards.
Integrating Stripe for secure online payments.
Managing complex state across multiple user roles.
futurePlans: Enable real-time chat between trainers and members.

name: Readly - Blogging Platform
shortDescription: Readly is a simple yet powerful blogging platform where users can write blogs, explore content, save to wishlist, and comment on posts.
challenges: Handling real-time comments across multiple users.
Optimizing animation performance for smooth UX.
futurePlans: Add user profile pages with bio and social links.
Introduce blog categories and search filters.
